name: Dance Floor
content: From head to toe you got it babe
You could be my favorite star
Cause that's what is here for
Cause that's what is here for
Into your step from side to side
To the rather farther flashing light
When the party is over come with me
Cause I can show you all over the world
In that the way you want to be
Cause that's what is here for
Cause that's what is here for
Into your step from side to side
To the rather farther flashing light
Now let's go left and right
Now stop and shake your body
Now stop and shake your body
Cause that's what is here for
Cause that's what is here for
Cause that's what is here for
Cause that's what is here for
Into your step from side to side
To the rather farther flashing light
